structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES OF THE FIRST CLASS

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 236, sec. 1. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 65. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3001, 3003.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Sale of real property for city taxes.
